resources.string: Could not write media player configuration files. Please, contact our support team.

There was an error while decompressing the update file. Please, try again.
Internal error: something went wrong while communicating with download manager.
The requested destination file already exists.
Internal error: something went wrong when processing remote information.
A license key specific for this device has been registered.

An error has occurred while obtaining information for updating the player. Please, contact our support team to help you solve this issue.

Update files are incomplete. Please, contact out support team for more information.
Failed to apply a clean update to the media player. Please, contact our support team.
Failed to mark the newly applied update as the last update. Please, contact our support team.
